idea-plugin.name: Equals and HashCode Deluxe Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Generates equals() and hashCode() using Guava library or Objects class from Java 7. If project language level is set to 7.0 Objects class is used, otherwise Guava. Usage:
  • ALT + INSERT -> equals() and hashCode() deluxe (inside Java Editor).
idea-plugin.change-notes:
version 1.0.1
  • Changed plugin name as slash character ('/') caused a bug with download link on JetBrains site.
